entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 0.8°C

Temperature: 0.8°C

Visibility: 4.0 km

Dewpoint: 0.7°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 800 metres this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Snow level 800 metres lowering to valley bottom late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
